verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> very <S%G846>thing<s%>, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%>, when I <S%G2064>came<s%>, I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> them of <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5463>rejoice<s%>; having <S%G3982>confidence<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the joy of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4928>anguish<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye should be made <S%G3076>sorry<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> more <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> hath caused <S%G3076>sorrow<s%>, he <S%G3076>hath<s%> caused <S%G3076>sorrow<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1691>me<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G575>in<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G2443>(that<s%> I <S%G1912>press<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> too <S%G1912>heavily<s%>) to <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.
Sufficient <S%G2425><s%> to such a <S%G5108>one<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2009>punishment<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was inflicted <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G4119>many<s%>;

so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G5121>contrariwise<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> should <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G5483>forgive<s%> him <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G3381>him<s%>, lest by any means such a <S%G5108>one<s%> should be swallowed <S%G2666>up<s%> with his <S%G4053>overmuch<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> this <S%G5124>end<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> did I <S%G1125>write<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G1382>proof<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5255>obedient<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> forgive <S%G2532>also<s%>: for2532, Genesis63 what <S%G1473>I<s%> also have <S%G5483>forgiven<s%>, if I have <S%G5483>forgiven<s%> <S%G1536>anything<s%>, for your sakes1223, Romans9 have <S%G5209>I<s%> forgiven it <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4122>advantage<s%> may be gained <S%G5259>over<s%> us by <S%G4567>Satan<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G50>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G50>ignorant<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3540>devices<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> when a <S%G2374>door<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>,

I <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G425>relief<s%> for <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, because <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> taking <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G657>leave<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%>, I went <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be unto <S%G2316>God<s%>, who <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2358>leadeth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in triumph <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> maketh <S%G5319>manifest<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> the <S%G3744>savor<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> a sweet <S%G2175>savor<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> unto <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> them <S%G3588>that<s%> are <S%G4982>saved<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> them <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%>;

to the one3739, Ezekiel3 a <S%G3744>savor<s%> from <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>; <S%G1161><s%> to the <S%G3739>other<s%> a <S%G3744>savor<s%> from <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G2425>sufficient<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G4183>many<s%>, <S%G2585>corrupting<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1505>sincerity<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, in the <S%G2714>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, speak <S%G2980>we<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
